Please read and note these instruction if needed ! :D

  • Use right click to pan and left click to rotate the camera.
  • Select whether you are labeling flooded or dry areas by the checkboxes on the right.
  • Press f to run point BFS from current point
  • Press p to select points for polygon selection
  • Press o to annotate with BFS on the selected polygon
  • Press g to highlight the full segmentation under current point
  • Press s to annotate the full segmentation under current point
  • Press d to annotate the connected segmentation under current point
  • Press z to undo the most recent annotation
  • Press m to bring this menu back
